mapper.select: select is_current as currSelect, device_sn as deviceSn, current_iccid as currIccid, signal, electric, connect_num as wifiNum, device_Status as deviceStatus, wifi_name as wifiName, wifi_pwd as wifiPwd, from tpl_mifi_device_t where active_user = #{currentUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_current = 1
